roleset.name: to make indistinct, not sharply in focus

example.name: transitive
example.text: The selective approach blurred themes such as domestic - demand issues , large - capitalization issues or high - technology shares , which had been providing at least some trading direction over the past few weeks , Mr. Wada said .

propbank.arg: themes such as domestic - demand issues , large - capitalization issues or high - technology shares , which had been providing at least some trading direction over the past few weeks

example.name: intransitive
example.text: In practice , however , the line between interpretation and redefinition of the criminal law long ago began to blur .

propbank.arg: the line between interpretation and redefinition of the criminal law

example.name: arg 1 only
example.text: I noticed blurring in both eyes while reading .

example.name: both args
example.text: My blurring of the lines was for my own convience

roleset.note: BLUR-V NOTES: Frames file for 'blur' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from blur.01-v predicate notes)
BLURRING-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to blur.01-v. Blur.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. No FN class. Framed by Katie. (from blurring.01-n)
BLURRY-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from blurry.01-j)
